title: Flags = Zastave
creator_credit: Neoplanta Film, Nancy Karkowsky and Zoran Jovanovic
brief_description: Zoran Jovanovic, in simple line drawings, explores man’s complex relationship to one of his most important symbols - the flag. Only women, Jovanovic implies, see the flag not as symbol but as fabric. Animation by Predrag Pantovic and Slavomir Calic.
creator_credit_for_label: Neoplanta Film, Nancy Karkowsky and Zoran Jovanovic
